verbose_text: 74 Various studies showed anticancer effect of the saffron extract on cancer cells in vitro; for example, Escribano et al, in a study on the effect of saffron extract on human cancer cells, found that the materials separated from saffron such as crocin, crocetin, picrocrocin, and safranal induced apoptosis in cancer cells.
evidence: crocetin, picrocrocin, and safranal induced apoptosis
